CREATE TABLE ingredients (

  ingredient_name STRING,
  quantity FLOAT,
  unit_of_measure STRING
)

### STATEMENT

TRUNCATE TABLE ingredients CASCADE;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE ingredients ( ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_name VARCHAR(255), quantity_in_stock DECIMAL(10,2) )

CREATE TABLE recipes ( recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name VARCHAR(255), serving_size INT )

CREATE TABLE ingredient_usage ( usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_id INT, ingredient_id INT, quantity_used DECIMAL(10,2), FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id), FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id) )

CREATE TABLE alerts ( alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_id INT, message VARCHAR(255), FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id) )

TRUNCATE TABLE ingredients;
